strings.Value: {n}Linzi's cheeks are wet with tears. She weeps and sniffles.{/n} "{d|Shariel}Sharel{/d}... the half-elf you saved from wrongful accusation and hired as the court tailor... he's been murdered!"

"Someone butchered him â€“ cut open his stomach! Right in front of his own workshop! His neighbor was scared to death when she found him this morning... oh, this is so horrible! He was such a nice fellow!"
